```{r setup, include=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
library(remi)

```

Reading in HNSCC dataset
```{r}
HNSCC <- readRDS("~/Projects/rotation_remi/data/test/scRNA/HNSCC_subpopulationclusters.rds")
```

Pulling out PCs
```{r}
for(c in "T cells") {
  cellsubset.obj <- subset(HNSCC, cell_type == c)
  cellsubset.obj <- RunPCA(cellsubset.obj)
  Loadings(cellsubset.obj, reduction = "pca")[, 1:30]
}
```
